statements: SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, publication_title, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE publication_author LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT * FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, publication_title, collaborators FROM research_publications WHERE collaborators IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_author='John Doe' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE citation_count > 100 ORDER BY citation_count DESC, publication_date ASC;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, collaborators FROM research_publications WHERE publication_title LIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date='2023-05-15' AND publication_author='Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM Publications;
SELECT author_name, title FROM Publications WHERE publish_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author_name FROM Publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Citations WHERE citation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT citing_publication_id, cited_publication_id FROM Citations;
SELECT * FROM Publications WHERE author_name='John Doe';
SELECT publication_id, title FROM Publications ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) FROM Publications GROUP BY author_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT p.title, c.citation_date FROM Publications p JOIN Citations c ON p.publication_id = c.cited_publication_id WHERE c.citation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(publish_date) AS latest_publish_date FROM Publications;
SELECT * FROM Publications;
SELECT title, authors FROM Publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM Publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Citations WHERE citation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY citation_date ASC;
SELECT publication_id, collaborator_name FROM Collaborations WHERE publication_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC, publication_id ASC;
SELECT title, authors FROM Publications WHERE authors LIKE '%John%' AND publication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, collaboration_date FROM Publications JOIN Collaborations ON Publications.publication_id = Collaborations.publication_id WHERE Collaborations.collaborator_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM Publications JOIN Citations ON Publications.publication_id = Citations.publication_id WHERE Citations.citation_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY Publications.title ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_publications, AVG(publication_id) AS avg_publication_id FROM Publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT title, authors FROM publications;
SELECT id, title FROM publications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT author, collaboration_partner FROM collaborations;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors;
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT title, authors FROM publications ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, title FROM publications WHERE id < 5;
SELECT id, title FROM publications WHERE authors @> ARRAY['John Doe'];
SELECT * FROM citation WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date, citation_count FROM publications;
SELECT author, title, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as publication_count FROM publications GROUP BY author;
SELECT id, name, affiliation, email FROM authors WHERE affiliation = 'University A';
SELECT id, citing_publication_id, cited_publication_id, citation_date FROM citations ORDER BY citation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE citation_count > 100 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_publications FROM publications GROUP BY author HAVING total_publications > 5 ORDER BY total_publications DESC;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT name AS author_name, location AS author_affiliation FROM authors JOIN affiliations ON authors.affiliation = affiliations.id ORDER BY author_name ASC;
